*Stingtra smiles*

Stingtra:....Thank you...

*Stingtra says to Windfire*

=
*Stingtra closes the CR Chamber door*

Stingtra: I shall thank Rowdy when I=
 see him next.

*Stingtra looks a the CR Chamber, holding her tears of happ=
iness back and sighed while looking at the CR Chamber which holds Quickstri=
ke*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Talon Harvilicz 
  To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 30, 2000 1:28 PM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars=



  (Hotmail is a pain in the butt!)

  Wildfire:





  Wildfire glared a=
t Quickstrike. I'm going to try it again. She glared at Stingtra for a seco=
nd, then scooted closer to Quickstrike. She placed her hands on the side of=
 his head and focused on him. 

  Keep your mind quiet, she said to Stingtr=
a. Don't interfere. She went into Quickstrike's mind, fighting through the =
images of his past that screamed at her earlier. She darkened it out, going=
 deeper into his mind, telling him to stay calm and speak to him, to tell h=
er what happened. She felt his skittishness, almost demanding to leave him =
alone and get away. She argued back that she was there to help, and if he d=
idn't let go, he would be in permit stasis lock. After that, he reluctantly=
 let go, and told her. 

  She saw the images of the dark waters, Stingtra,=
 the Vok symbols, and the tentacle-like arm that had him, that kept on drag=
ging him. She felt just as upset as he was, feeling for a few seconds that =
it had her too. She dimmed to optics until ! they had them closed. 

  She =
went into his mind further, to where KitKat said the wolf was. She saw the =
wires, she saw the ground that didn't seem normal. She held his head tight,=
 trying not to let go. She had to know. If this little bot was so valuable,=
 she had to know in order to help him. 

  She hung in there with him, feel=
ing his feelings and almost feeling his pain. She saw the wolf being built,=
 and it was put to life because of his energy. Then it dawned---it was goin=
g to use him. She forced herself more, but Primus she wanted out. 

  The w=
olf, the third wolf. The heavy furred, big wolf. She heard him screaming Ge=
t out of here! I'll deal with this thing! Go! 

  He saved them. He saved Q=
uickstrike's sanity. 

  Wildfire let go, freeing herself, and gasped. He c=
rawled away from him and stood up, walking away from a few steps. He held h=
er chest and looked at Stingtra. 

  He's lucky, she said to her. He'll liv=
e. If it wasn't for Ro! wdy Wolf, he would of became theirs. They had his m=
ind, but when he was taken away, the link was broken. Be grateful for that.=
 Keep him in the CR for the moment. He'll be all right in a few megacycles.=
 But take him out of it later. He needs to be with the others.
